properties.query:
let q0=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((ActingProcessName endswith "\\EQNEDT32EXE" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\EXCELEXE" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\MSACCESSEXE" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\MSPUBexe" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\ONENOTEEXE" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\POWERPNTexe" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\VISIOexe" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\WINWORDEXE" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\wordpadexe" or ActingProcessName endswith "\\wordviewexe") and (((TargetProcessFilename =~ "bitsadminexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "CertOCexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "CertUtilexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "CmdExe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "CMSTPEXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "cscriptexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "curlexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "HHexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "IEExecexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "InstallUtilexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "javawexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "MicrosoftWorkflowCompilerexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "msdtexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "MSHTAEXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "msiexecexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "Msxslexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "odbcconfexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pcaluaexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShellEXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "RegAsmexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "RegSvcsexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "REGSVR32exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "RUNDLL32exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "schtasksexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "ScriptRunnerexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "wmicexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "WorkFoldersexe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "wscriptexe") or (TargetProcessName endswith "\\AppVLPexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\bashexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\bitsadminexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\certocexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\certutilexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\cmdexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\cmstpexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\controlexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\cscriptexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\curlexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\forfilesexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\hhexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\ieexecexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\installutilexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\javawexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\mftraceexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\MicrosoftWorkflowCompilerexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\msbuildexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\msdtexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\mshtaexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\msidbexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\msiexecexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\msxslexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\odbcconfexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pcaluaexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershellexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwshexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\regasmexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\regsvcsexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\regsvr32exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\rundll32exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\schtasksexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\scrconsexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\scriptrunnerexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\shexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\svchostexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\verclsidexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\wmicexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\workfoldersexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\wscriptexe")) or (TargetProcessName contains "\\AppData\\" or TargetProcessName contains "\\Users\\Public\\" or TargetProcessName contains "\\ProgramData\\" or TargetProcessName contains "\\Windows\\Tasks\\" or TargetProcessName contains "\\Windows\\Temp\\" or TargetProcessName contains "\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\")))|extend RuleId="5163A000-5160-5160-5160-5163A0000211"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_office_susp_child_processes.yml";
let q1=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (TargetProcessName endswith "\\pingexe" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "0x")|extend RuleId="1a0d4aba-7668-4365-9ce4-6d79ab088dfd"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_ping_hex_ip.yml";
let q2=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (TargetProcessFileDescription =~ "Command-line SSH, Telnet, and Rlogin client" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -R ")|extend RuleId="48a61b29-389f-4032-b317-b30de6b95314"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_plink_port_forwarding.yml";
let q3=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\plinkexe" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains ":127001:3389") or ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\plinkexe" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains ":3389") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -P 443" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -P 22")))|extend RuleId="f38ce0b9-5e97-4b47-a211-7dc8d8b871da"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_plink_susp_tunneling.yml";
let q4=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershellexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwshexe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShellExe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwshdll")) and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Add-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ConvertTo-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Disable-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Enable-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Export-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Get-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Grant-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Install-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Invoke-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Join-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "New-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Open-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Read-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Register-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Restore-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Search-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Send-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Set-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Start-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Update-AADInt"))|extend RuleId="c86500e9-a645-4680-98d7-f882c70c1ea3"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_aadinternals_cmdlets_execution.yml";
let q5=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SystemManagementAutomationAmsiUtils" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "amsiInitFailed") or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "[Ref]AssemblyGetType" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SetValue($null,$true)" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "NonPublic,Static"))|extend RuleId="30edb182-aa75-42c0-b0a9-e998bb29067c"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_amsi_init_failed_bypass.yml";
let q6=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershellexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwshexe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShellEXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwshdll")) and ((TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -e" and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " JAB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " SUVYI" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " SQBFAFgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " aQBlAHgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " aWV4I" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " IAA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " IAB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " UwB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " cwB")) or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "exe -ENCOD " or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " BA^J e-")) and (not(TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -ExecutionPolicy remotesigned ")))|extend RuleId="ca2092a1-c273-4878-9b4b-0d60115bf5ea"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_encoded_cmd.yml";
let q7=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "OjpGcm9tQmFzZTY0U3RyaW5n"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "o6RnJvbUJhc2U2NFN0cmluZ"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "6OkZyb21CYXNlNjRTdHJpbm"
| where ( or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "OgA6AEYAcgBvAG0AQgBhAHMAZQA2ADQAUwB0AHIAaQBuAGcA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "oAOgBGAHIAbwBtAEIAYQBzAGUANgA0AFMAdAByAGkAbgBnA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "6ADoARgByAG8AbQBCAGEAcwBlADYANABTAHQAcgBpAG4AZw"))|extend RuleId="fdb62a13-9a81-4e5c-a38f-ea93a16f6d7c"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_frombase64string.yml";
let q8=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYIChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWCAoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVggKF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4IChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleCAoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXggKF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4IChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleCAoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXggKE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYIChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWCAoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVggKE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYKF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVgoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4KF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXgoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4KE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXgoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYKE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVgoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYKCgn"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWCgoJ"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVgoKC"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4KCgn"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleCgoJ"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXgoKC"
| where (( or  or  or  or  or  or  or  or  or ) or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SQBFAFgAIAAoAFsA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kARQBYACAAKABbA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JAEUAWAAgACgAWw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aQBlAHgAIAAoAFsA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kAZQB4ACAAKABbA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pAGUAeAAgACgAWw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aQBlAHgAIAAoAE4AZQB3A" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kAZQB4ACAAKABOAGUAdw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pAGUAeAAgACgATgBlAHcA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SQBFAFgAIAAoAE4AZQB3A" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kARQBYACAAKABOAGUAdw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JAEUAWAAgACgATgBlAHcA"))|extend RuleId="88f680b8-070e-402c-ae11-d2914f2257f1"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_iex.yml";
let q9=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershellexe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwshexe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShellEXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwshdll")) and TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -e" and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SQBuAHYAbwBrAGUALQ" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kAbgB2AG8AawBlAC0A" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JAG4AdgBvAGsAZQAtA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SW52b2tlL" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ludm9rZS" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JbnZva2Ut"))|extend RuleId="6385697e-9f1b-40bd-8817-f4a91f40508e"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_invoke.yml";
union q0, q1, q2, q3, q4, q5, q6, q7, q8, q9;
